rdf:Description.dc:title: Alberta's healthy aging and seniors wellness strategic framework 2002-2012 2002
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Alberta Health and Wellness.
KPMG Consulting.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: Edmonton, Alta. : Alberta Health and Wellness,
rdf:Description.dc:description: The healthy aging conceptual model has four components : a) promoting health and preventing disease and injury -- b) optimizing mental and physical function -- c) managing chronic conditions -- d) engaging with life.
"This report was prepared for the Healthy Aging Subgroup, Alberta Health and Wellness by KPMG Consulting."
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Primary health care
Community health services
Health care teams
Older people
Health Promotion.
